3f0f15d9-489b-4a07-bbd4-4dd9643535a7.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

89567f84-7ead-4072-9040-0262df09d178.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.
